dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1,274 marine losses (paid) collected by a French private insurer between January 2003 and June 2006, used to analyze extreme heavy-tailed losses.
dcterms:title: Marine Losses Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10,915 wildfire suppression costs in Alberta, Canada, from 1983 to 1995, used to analyze extreme heavy-tailed losses.
dcterms:title: Wildfire Suppression Costs Dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Moscadelli
dcterms:description: A dataset containing operational losses across 8 different business lines, with over 40,000 reported losses, used to analyze the tail indices of operational risks.
dcterms:title: Operational Losses Dataset
